original_title: Army-designed 'Apaaya' attracts people at Gangarama  'Vesak' Zone
original_body_lines: The mock exhibit, 'Apaaya' (hell), designed by the Sri Lanka Army's  Directorate of Electrical and Mechanical Engineers at the  Gangarama 'Buddha Rashmi Vesak Zone' attracts large crowd. Pix by Pradeep Dilrukshana
